titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the To Hellenbach, by Carter B. Strong.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: To Hellenbach, by Carter B. Strong.

archdesc.bioghist: Resident of Jackson, Mich., and student at the University of Michigan who served in 395th Infantry, 99th Division, in Europe during World War II. He was later mayor of Traverse City, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Reminiscence of his military service, 1943-1946, illustrated with photographs and maps. The reminiscence was originally written in 1946.
